certifications.title: AWS Certified Developer - Associate
certifications.description: Validates expertise in developing, deploying, and debugging cloud-based applications using AWS services, with a strong focus on core AWS APIs, security best practices, and CI/CD workflows.

certifications.description: Demonstrates foundational knowledge of artificial intelligence, machine learning concepts, and responsible AI, along with understanding AWS AI/ML services and real-world use cases.

certifications.description: Covers foundational AWS cloud concepts including core services, security, pricing models, and architectural best practices for building scalable cloud solutions.
